title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\AnalyzeContentRequest
name: AnalyzeContentRequest
description:
The request message for [Participants.AnalyzeContent][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.Participants.AnalyzeContent].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.AnalyzeContentRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.participant
params.description: Required. The name of the participant this text comes from. Format: projects/<Project ID>/locations/<Location ID>/conversations/<Conversation ID>/participants/<Participant ID>.

params.name: data.text_input
params.description: The natural language text to be processed.

params.name: data.event_input
params.description: An input event to send to Dialogflow.

params.name: data.reply_audio_config
params.description: Speech synthesis configuration. The speech synthesis settings for a virtual agent that may be configured for the associated conversation profile are not used when calling AnalyzeContent. If this configuration is not supplied, speech synthesis is disabled.

params.name: data.cx_parameters
params.description: Additional parameters to be put into Dialogflow CX session parameters. To remove a parameter from the session, clients should explicitly set the parameter value to null. Note: this field should only be used if you are connecting to a Dialogflow CX agent.

params.name: data.request_id
params.description: A unique identifier for this request. Restricted to 36 ASCII characters. A random UUID is recommended. This request is only idempotent if a request_id is provided.
